channel.title: Problem with dynamic shadows
channel.description:
I am making a custom L4D2 map and I've been having some glitches with the dynamic shadows not appearing right. Here is a pic of the glitch: ![](upload://diyENRbBogNwNDIk8RHNJmip1vu.jpeg) This random rectangular shadows appear when I aim the flashlight at something. They also appear from the flash when I fire a gun. Sometimes the flashlight doesn't show up at all. This occurs all over the map in all different places. I have no leaks in my map and hammer reports no problems. I'm not running vis, could that be the problem?
Also, an unrelated problem, all the env-fire entities in my map are set to have a flame height of 8 units, but they show up much higher in the map, how can I fix that?
Help appreciated.

item.title: Problem with dynamic shadows
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
Before you run normal VIS, optimise your map by making every brush that is there for detail a func_detail entity, otherwise you will be waiting for eternity for the map to finish compiling.
